references: Amending: Ord 48520. Repealing: Ord 63657, Ord 63831, Ord 64602.
summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; regulating the use, sale and price of electric current; amending Section 17, as amended, of Ordinance No. 48520, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 63657, 63831, 64602 and all other ordinances or parts thereof in conflict herewith.
